name: The Witcher 3
description: i bought this and its dlc for $20. ive played for well over 200 hours. thats all i have to say. even if it was double full price it would be well worth it.

name: The Witcher 2
description: honestly no clue how this is the same series as the witcher 1, the combat is fun (even though it seems like some people didnt like it), the game looks incredible and the sound design is very good. the only issue i had was a few bugs (not nearly as many as one though)

name: The Witcher
description: i usually dont buy bad games, sadly i thought i could handle the combat and the textures arent too bad. guess i was wrong, the combat is straight up atrocious, i know its a product of its time but it feels more like a product of the 1950s. it crashes constantly and sometimes when you tab out the whole right monitor goes black until you close it on task manager. also the movement is ass.

name: Don't Look Back
description: my favourite flash game of all time, surely i dont like it just because of nostalgia, it only take about 8 minutes to beat so go play it

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: some of the most fun combat in any video game and makes feudal japan seem a lot more fun

name: Guild Wars 2
description: great bang for your buck and the game actually respects your time. no subscription makes me feel like i can just fuck around without feeling like im burning money.

name: Kenshi
description: sometimes you just get killed by the mysterious beams of light, thats just the way the cookie crumbles in both life and kenshi

name: Old School Runescape
description: played 100 hours in one week, worst mistake of my life. runescape is the only open world game that makes me actually feel like im exploring a large and dangerous world as opposed to playing the same game over and over again which a lot of the modern games feel like also the music is peak.
